contact.description: Have questions or suggestions? We'd love to hear from you! You can:
contact.title: Contact

contribute.description: TibiaCores is an open-source project, and we welcome contributions from the community. Whether you're a developer, designer, or just have ideas to share, you can help make TibiaCores better:

list.bugs: Submit bug reports or feature requests

contribute.title: Contribute

donation.description: Your donations help TibiaCores grow and improve, allowing us to add new features, maintain the servers, and provide a better experience for all users. If you'd like to support our development, you can send in-game donations to:
donation.title: Donation

about.subtitle: Your companion app for managing and sharing soul core lists
about.title: About TibiaCores

whatIs.description: TibiaCores is a powerful tool designed to help you organize and manage your characters' soul cores progression. Whether you're looking to unlock 200 animus masteries or all of them, TibiaCores makes it easy to keep track of your collection.
whatIs.title: What is TibiaCores?

rejected.message: Your claim has been rejected. This can happen if:

reasons.1: The verification code was not found in your character's comment
reasons.2: Your character's comment was recently changed and hasn't updated on Tibia.com yet

rejected.title: Claim Rejected

steps.4: Add the following verification code to your comment:

characterClaim.subtitle: Verify ownership of your character to use it in your lists

success.message: You are now the verified owner of this character. Redirecting to your profile...
success.title: Claim Approved!

characterClaim.title: Claim Character
characterClaim.verifySubtitle: Follow these steps to verify your character ownership
characterClaim.waitNote: Note: After adding the code, please wait a few minutes for the changes to propagate before checking the claim status.
characterClaim.waitTime: Please wait {seconds} seconds before checking again

characterDetails.shareCharacterDescription: Share this character's soul cores with others by copying the link below.

cookieConsent.description: We use cookies to enhance your experience. By continuing to visit this site you agree to our use of cookies.

emailVerification.subtitle: Almost there! Just one more step to get started.

about.description: TibiaCores is your companion app for managing and sharing soul core lists. Create characters, build collections, and share them with friends. Join existing lists via share codes or direct links.
about.title: About TibiaCores

home.subtitle: Your companion app for managing and sharing soul core lists
home.title: Welcome to TibiaCores

noLists.subtitle: Use the forms above to get started!
noLists.title: You haven't created any lists or joined any yet.

highscores.title: Highscores
highscores.subtitle: Characters with the most soul cores unlocked

error.title: Failed to load highscores
error.description: An error occurred while loading the highscores. Please try again.

errors.characterNotFound: Character not found in Tibia. Please check the name and try again.

listDetail.inactiveCharacterTooltip: This character is inactive due to a claim process
listDetail.shareListDescription: Share this link with others to let them join your list:

warning.message: If you sign out now, you'll lose access to your current session and all your data. Consider registering an account to save your progress.
warning.title: Warning: You're using an anonymous account

contact.content: If you have any questions about our Privacy Policy or how we handle your data, please contact us at support@tibiacores.com.
contact.title: Contact Us

cookies.content: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to enhance your experience and provide essential functionality. Here are the types of cookies we use:
cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking

types.analytics: Analytics cookies to understand how you use our app
types.necessary: Necessary cookies for basic functionality and security
types.preferences: Preference cookies to remember your settings

data.content: We collect minimal personal information necessary to provide our services. This includes your email address for authentication and any data you voluntarily provide when creating or joining soul core lists.
data.title: Data Collection

introduction.content: At TibiaCores, we take your privacy seriously. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information when you use our application.
introduction.title: Introduction

security.content: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your data. All data is encrypted in transit and at rest. We regularly review and update our security practices to ensure your information remains safe.
security.title: Security

characters.empty: You haven't claimed any characters yet

lists.empty: You don't have any lists yet
